p: The DPPH radical scavenging assay was carried out according to the method described earlier [ 13] with slight modification. Ascorbic acid was taken as standard. In brief, an equal volume of the extract/standard (1 μg/mL, 10 μg/mL, and 100 μg/mL) and 60 μM DPPH solution were mixed in a test tube. The reaction mixture was kept at room temperature in the dark for 30 min. The absorbance of the solution was measured at 517 nm using a UV-VIS spectrophotometer (Shimadzu UV-1800).
